content: उत्पादक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (दिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Productive, effective, bringing about; अर्थस्योत्पादकं मंत्रिणं <ls>H. 3. 17</ls> acquiring. --कः {@--1@} A producer, generator, a father; <ls>Ms. 2. 146</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 32.</ls> {@--2@} A fabulous animal with eight feet, called शरभ. --कं Origin, cause.
